summary: A gambler is drawn into a life of money and power to make a quick buck, but he quickly realizes he is part of a setup that could cost him his life.
cast: George Eads|AnnaLynne McCord|Steven Seagal|Ted Levine|Vinnie Jones|Stephen Lang|Tia Carrere|Fiona Dourif|Elsie Fisher|John Lewis|Daniel Aldema|Mark D. Espinoza|Loni Love|Cady Lanigan|John Rushing|Jon K. Farless|Kendra Waldman|Christa Collins|Chuck Brennan|Jessica Uberuaga|James Cooney|Marc Winnick|Frank Mir|Angelo Antuna|Maurice Smith|Cade Carradine|Mark Alexander Herz|Lauren Byrd
title: Juego sucio en Las Vegas
